title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk; tempera
Technique: painted on plain weave
description: Light blue-green silk with polychrome tempera painted design. Brown serpentine branches with green foliage and flowers in white, orange and pink. Green, orange and violet birds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk; tempera
Technique: painted on plain weave. Gift of Sarah Cooper Hewitt. 1931-25-18.
